content:
Sure, here are five different options for Goal 1 Objective 2:

1. Develop a mediation training program for residents to help them learn how to effectively mediate conflicts between their peers.
2. Create a peer mentorship program where upperclassmen residents can offer guidance and support to underclassmen residents.
3. Host workshops on effective communication and active listening to help residents better understand and empathize with each other.
4. Establish a peer counseling service where trained residents can offer confidential support and advice to their peers.
5. Organize group activities and games that encourage cooperation and teamwork, such as escape rooms or team-building exercises.
